entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 24 April 2023
